did.unittitle: New York City mixed manuscript collection
did.abstract: The New York City mixed manuscript collection includes naval orders from Captain Kennedy to Captain Joseph Deane, 1766; receipts belonging to Benjamin Sands; the last will and testament of Elizabeth Sharpas, 1785; and naturalization papers of Peter Ludlow. All manuscripts originate from New York City.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1977.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This small collection is housed in a single folder with no particular arrangement.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); New York City ephemera, 1977.438, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was renamed from "New York City ephemera" to "New York City mixed manuscript collection" by Dee Bowers in November 2023. At that time the collection was also rehoused and the finding aid revised.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The New York City mixed manuscript collection includes naval orders from Captain Kennedy to Captain Joseph Deane, 1766; receipts belonging to Benjamin Sands; the last will and testament of Elizabeth Sharpas, 1785; and naturalization papers of Peter Ludlow. All manuscripts originate from New York City.
